code: A = -2; B = 1; C = 1; D = 0; sys = ss(A, B, C, D); t = 0:0.01:5; u = ones(size(t)); y = lsim(sys, u, t); figure; plot(t, y); title('Step Response of First-Order System'); xlabel('Time (s)'); ylabel('Output'); grid on;
description: [plot shape: Exponential rise, maximum: 1, minimum: 0, pivot points: (0,0), direction: Ascending, x-intercepts: N/A, y-intercepts: 0, final value: 1, overshoot: 0, rise time: ~0.5s, settling time: ~2s, other notable features: Smooth curve approaching 1 asymptotically.]
